## PayflowProInput interface

Required input for Payflow Pro and Payments Pro payment methods.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PayflowProInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cc\_details](./magento-api.payflowproinput.cc_details.md) | [CreditCardDetailsInput](./magento-api.creditcarddetailsinput.md) | Required input for credit card related information |
|  [is\_active\_payment\_token\_enabler?](./magento-api.payflowproinput.is_active_payment_token_enabler.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> States whether details about the customer's credit/debit card should be tokenized for later usage. Required only if Vault is enabled for PayPal Payflow Pro payment integration. |
